QuestData.Title: As the Smoke Rises
QuestData.Description: Aruuna burns.$B$BThe arakkoa swooped down from their spires and are turning everything to ash. Draenei, talbuk, even orc; they care not for allegiances. They merely want to watch the world burn.$B$BI barely escaped with my life, but my best friend, Barum, stayed behind to find his daughter. The others all say you are a great champion. Please, I beg of you, go to Aruuna and find them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Crystal-Shaper Barum near Aruuna in Talador.
